message.body: I don't think I'm going to be able to find a flight that gets in and leaves the same time as you :( I had to wait for the refund of the other ticket and now they all seem sold out :(
Aw damn! Hmm maybe more flights will open up next wk after the holidays? When do u leave for chile?
Leaving Friday for chile! I'll keep checking! Otherwise I might just have to find different times. I have all my alerts set but if you see anything let me know!
Will do. We will figure it out for sure!
